Samuel Onyemelukwe bụ onye ọchụnta ego mgbasa ozi na ntụrụndụ nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ osote onye isi nchịkwa, mpaghara West Africa maka Trace, ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ lekwasịrị anya na omenala Afro-urban na Africa. Ụlọ ọrụ ya, Venator Partners nwere nnukwu ikike nke Trace Africa.
Onyemelukwe nwetara nzere bachelọ nka na Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Southern California na MBA na nzere Masta na teknụzụ ozi na Mahadum Boston
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Walt Disney na Burbank, California
N'afọ 2009, ọ laghachiri Africa wee sonye na Viacom Media dị ka MTV Network, Business Development Manager, Nigeria.

Onyemelukwe nwetara nnukwu ikikere Trace TV na West Africa n'afọ 2011 ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ịtụgharị Trace TV otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ a ma ama n'Africa. Ọ malitere ọtụtụ ọwa TV na-ewu ewu dịka Trace Naija na Trace Gospel na DSTV na STV Music na Startimes
Ọ bụ ugbu a osote onye isi oche nke Global Business Development for Trace.
